{{*mp|March 29}} '''[[Soyuz TMA-08M]]''' ''(mission patch pictured)'' transports three astronauts to the [[International Space Station]] via a new route, reducing the journey's duration from two days to six hours.
 
{{*mp|March 26}} [[Madagascar]] '''[[2013 Madagascar locust infestation|experiences]]''' its worst [[locust]] infestation since the 1950s.

Commissioner of Registration|rules]]''' that [[Foreign domestic helpers in Hong Kong|foreign domestic workers]] are not allowed to become [[Hong Kong residents|Hong Kong permanent residents]].

Commissioner of Registration|rules]]''' that [[Foreign domestic helpers in Hong Kong|foreign domestic workers]] are not allowed to become [[Hong Kong residents|Hong Kong permanent residents]].

 +
